languages.text: "Разумеется. На моих плечах — организация ежедневной, рутинной жизни корабля. Ворох задач и проблем, от которых я надеюсь оградить вас, Лорд-капитан. Ситуация на нижних палубах тревожила меня, и я неоднократно вмешивался лично. Вероятно, поэтому меня и запомнили. Вас они и в лицо не знают. Вы для них — почти что существо из легенд, что проводит время на ступенях {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}, не меньше. А я — тот человек, от чьего имени оглашаются приказы об урезанных пайках или сниженном отоплении отсека".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется. На моих плечах — организация ежедневной, рутинной жизни корабля. Ворох задач и проблем, от которых я надеюсь оградить вас, Лорд-капитан. Ситуация на нижних палубах тревожила меня, и я неоднократно вмешивался лично. Вероятно, поэтому меня и запомнили. Вас они и в лицо не знают. Вы для них — почти что существо из легенд, что проводит время на ступенях {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}, не меньше. А я — тот человек, от чьего имени оглашаются приказы об урезанных пайках или сниженном отоплении отсека".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Of course they were. The organisation of the daily, routine life of the ship rests upon my shoulders. The mountain of challenges and problems from which I endeavour to insulate you, Lord Captain. The situation on the lower decks has been a cause for concern, and I have intervened personally on more than one occasion. That must be why they remember me. They do not know your face. To them, you are akin to a creature of legend, one who has stood on the steps of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, no less. Whereas I am the man whose name is attached to every order docking rations or lowering a bay's heating."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. На моих плечах — организация ежедневной, рутинной жизни корабля. Ворох задач и проблем, от которых я надеюсь оградить вас, Лорд-капитан. Ситуация на нижних палубах тревожила меня, и я неоднократно вмешивался лично. Вероятно, поэтому меня и запомнили. Вас они и в лицо не знают. Вы для них — почти что существо из легенд, что проводит время на ступенях {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}, не меньше. А я — тот человек, от чьего имени оглашаются приказы об урезанных пайках или сниженном отоплении отсека".

The mountain of challenges and problems from which I endeavour to insulate you, Lord Captain. The situation on the lower decks has been a cause for concern, and I have intervened personally on more than one occasion. That must be why they remember me. They do not know your face. To them, you are akin to a creature of legend, one who has stood on the steps of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, no less. Whereas I am the man whose name is attached to every order docking rations or lowering a bay's heating."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “确实是这样。这艘船上所有日常的例行组织工作都落在我的肩上。我会努力处理掉那些堆积如山的挑战和问题，让您彻底不用操心这些问题，舰长大人。底层甲板的情况一直很令人担忧，我曾不止一次地进行干预，这就是为什么他们记得我。他们并没见过您的面孔。对他们而言，您就像是传说中的大人物，是层站在{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}台阶上的人，这一点毫不夸张。至于我，我是负责压迫劳苦大众的人。每个克扣口粮的命令，或是每个降低甲板供热的命令，都是我亲笔签署的。”
languages.original_text: "Of course they were. The organisation of the daily, routine life of the ship rests upon my shoulders. The mountain of challenges and problems from which I endeavour to insulate you, Lord Captain. The situation on the lower decks has been a cause for concern, and I have intervened personally on more than one occasion. That must be why they remember me. They do not know your face. To them, you are akin to a creature of legend, one who has stood on the steps of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, no less. Whereas I am the man whose name is attached to every order docking rations or lowering a bay's heating."

traits.locale_text: “确实是这样。这艘船上所有日常的例行组织工作都落在我的肩上。我会努力处理掉那些堆积如山的挑战和问题，让您彻底不用操心这些问题，舰长大人。底层甲板的情况一直很令人担忧，我曾不止一次地进行干预，这就是为什么他们记得我。他们并没见过您的面孔。对他们而言，您就像是传说中的生物，是层站在{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}台阶上的人，这一点毫不夸张。至于我，我是负责压迫劳苦大众的人。每个克扣口粮的命令，或是每个降低甲板供热的命令，都是我亲笔签署的。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Por supuesto que lo estaban. La organización de la vida diaria rutinaria de la nave es mi responsabilidad. Es la montaña de desafíos y problemas de la que intento protegerle, Lord Capitán. La situación en las cubiertas inferiores ha sido preocupante y he intervenido personalmente en varias ocasiones. Por eso me recuerdan. No conocen su cara. Para ellos, es usted una criatura legendaria, alguien que ha pisado los escalones del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. Mientras tanto, yo soy el que firma cada orden de racionamiento y de reducción de calefacción de una bahía».
languages.original_text: "Of course they were. The organisation of the daily, routine life of the ship rests upon my shoulders. The mountain of challenges and problems from which I endeavour to insulate you, Lord Captain. The situation on the lower decks has been a cause for concern, and I have intervened personally on more than one occasion. That must be why they remember me. They do not know your face. To them, you are akin to a creature of legend, one who has stood on the steps of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, no less. Whereas I am the man whose name is attached to every order docking rations or lowering a bay's heating."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto que lo estaban. La organización de la vida diaria rutinaria de la nave es mi responsabilidad. Es la montaña de desafíos y problemas de la que intento protegerle, Lord Capitán. La situación en las cubiertas inferiores ha sido preocupante y he intervenido personalmente en varias ocasiones. Por eso me recuerdan. No conocen su cara. Para ellos, es usted una criatura legendaria, alguien que ha pisado los escalones del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. Mientras tanto, yo soy el que firma cada orden de racionamiento y de reducción de calefacción de una bahía».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「もちろん、そうでした。この船の日々の日常生活の組織は、この肩にかかっていおります。山積する困難や問題から、我はあなたを守ろうと努力しているのです、ロード・キャプテン。下層デッキの状況は悩み種であり、何度も個人的に介入しました。だから彼らは我を覚えているのでしょう。彼らはあなたの顔を知りません。彼らにとって、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の階段に足を踏み入れたことのある、伝説の生き物のような存在なのです。それに対し我は、配給の順序の変更やベイの暖房を弱める命令に、その名を連ねる男です」
languages.original_text: "Of course they were. The organisation of the daily, routine life of the ship rests upon my shoulders. The mountain of challenges and problems from which I endeavour to insulate you, Lord Captain. The situation on the lower decks has been a cause for concern, and I have intervened personally on more than one occasion. That must be why they remember me. They do not know your face. To them, you are akin to a creature of legend, one who has stood on the steps of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, no less. Whereas I am the man whose name is attached to every order docking rations or lowering a bay's heating."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、そうでした。この船の日々の日常生活の組織は、この肩にかかっていおります。山積する困難や問題から、我はあなたを守ろうと努力しているのです、ロード・キャプテン。下層デッキの状況は悩み種であり、何度も個人的に介入しました。だから彼らは我を覚えているのでしょう。彼らはあなたの顔を知りません。彼らにとって、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の階段に足を踏み入れたことのある、伝説の生き物のような存在なのです。それに対し我は、配給の順序の変更やベイの暖房を弱める命令に、その名を連ねる男です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Natürlich. Es liegt in meiner Verantwortung, den Alltag auf dem Schiff zu organisieren, die Routine. Den Berg von Herausforderungen und Problemen, von dem ich Euch fernzuhalten versuchen, Lord Captain. Die Lage auf den unteren Decks gibt seit längerem Anlass zur Sorge, und ich habe mehrfach persönlich interveniert. Vermutlich erinnern sie sich daher an mich. Euer Gesicht kennen sie nicht. Für sie seid Ihr ein Fabelwesen, eine Legende, die auf den Stufen des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} stand. Ich dagegen bin der Mann, dessen Name auf jedem Befehl steht, der die Rationen kürzt oder die Heizung in den Unterkünften ausschaltet."
languages.original_text: "Of course they were. The organisation of the daily, routine life of the ship rests upon my shoulders. The mountain of challenges and problems from which I endeavour to insulate you, Lord Captain. The situation on the lower decks has been a cause for concern, and I have intervened personally on more than one occasion. That must be why they remember me. They do not know your face. To them, you are akin to a creature of legend, one who has stood on the steps of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, no less. Whereas I am the man whose name is attached to every order docking rations or lowering a bay's heating."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Es liegt in meiner Verantwortung, den Alltag auf dem Schiff zu organisieren, die Routine. Den Berg von Herausforderungen und Problemen, von dem ich Euch fernzuhalten versuchen, Lord Captain. Die Lage auf den unteren Decks gibt seit längerem Anlass zur Sorge, und ich habe mehrfach persönlich interveniert. Vermutlich erinnern sie sich daher an mich. Euer Gesicht kennen sie nicht. Für sie seid Ihr ein Fabelwesen, eine Legende, die auf den Stufen des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} stand. Ich dagegen bin der Mann, dessen Name auf jedem Befehl steht, der die Rationen kürzt oder die Heizung in den Unterkünften ausschaltet."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Rien d'étonnant à cela. L'organisation de la vie quotidienne à bord du vaisseau est entièrement de mon ressort. C'est une montagne de défis et de problèmes que je m'efforce de vous épargner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. La situation sur les ponts inférieurs est particulièrement compliquée, et il m'a déjà fallu intervenir personnellement à plusieurs reprises, raison pour laquelle ils se souviennent de moi. En ce qui vous concerne, ils ne vous ont encore jamais {mf|vu|vue}. À leurs yeux, vous êtes une figure de légende, une icône qui a eu l'honneur de se tenir sur les marches du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, rien que ça. Alors que moi, je suis l'homme dont le nom est rattaché à tous les ordres de rationnement de la nourriture et du chauffage. »
languages.original_text: "Of course they were. The organisation of the daily, routine life of the ship rests upon my shoulders. The mountain of challenges and problems from which I endeavour to insulate you, Lord Captain. The situation on the lower decks has been a cause for concern, and I have intervened personally on more than one occasion. That must be why they remember me. They do not know your face. To them, you are akin to a creature of legend, one who has stood on the steps of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, no less. Whereas I am the man whose name is attached to every order docking rations or lowering a bay's heating."

traits.locale_text: « Rien d'étonnant à cela. L'organisation de la vie quotidienne à bord du vaisseau est entièrement de mon ressort. C'est une montagne de défis et de problèmes que je m'efforce de vous épargner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. La situation sur les ponts inférieurs est particulièrement compliquée, et il m'a déjà fallu intervenir personnellement à plusieurs reprises, raison pour laquelle ils se souviennent de moi. En ce qui vous concerne, ils ne vous ont encore jamais {mf|vu|vue}. À leurs yeux, vous êtes une figure de légende, une icône qui a eu l'honneur de se tenir sur les marches du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, rien que ça. Alors que moi, je suis l'homme dont le nom est rattaché à tous les ordres de rationnement de la nourriture et du chauffage. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Haykıracaklar tabii. Geminin günlük rutininden ben sorumluyum. Lord Kaptan, sizi onca zorluktan ve meseleden muhafaza etmek için canımı dişime takıyorum. Alt güvertedeki durum endişe verici, çok defa müdahale etmem gerekti. Beni unutmamalarının sebebi de bu olsa gerek. Sizin yüzünüzü bilmezler. Onlara göre canlı bir efsanesiniz, hem de {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'ın{/g} basamaklarından geçmiş bir efsane. Bense kumanyaları azaltan yahut ısıtmayı kısan her emrin ardındaki isimden ibaretim."
languages.original_text: "Of course they were. The organisation of the daily, routine life of the ship rests upon my shoulders. The mountain of challenges and problems from which I endeavour to insulate you, Lord Captain. The situation on the lower decks has been a cause for concern, and I have intervened personally on more than one occasion. That must be why they remember me. They do not know your face. To them, you are akin to a creature of legend, one who has stood on the steps of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, no less. Whereas I am the man whose name is attached to every order docking rations or lowering a bay's heating."

traits.locale_text: "Haykıracaklar tabii. Geminin günlük rutininden ben sorumluyum. Lord Kaptan, sizi onca zorluktan ve meseleden muhafaza etmek için canımı dişime takıyorum. Alt güvertedeki durum endişe verici, çok defa müdahale etmem gerekti. Beni unutmamalarının sebebi de bu olsa gerek. Sizin yüzünüzü bilmezler. Onlara göre canlı bir efsanesiniz, hem de {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'ın basamaklarından geçmiş bir efsane. Bense kumanyaları azaltan yahut ısıtmayı kısan her emrin ardındaki isimden ibaretim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
